## Version 1.0.0

Base functions for creating display modals within the R-Sell App.

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("t2tech-corp/Rsell-Packages/rsellModals")
```


## Usage

Package loaded from the **global.R** file in the Shiny App.

## Link

Package location in Github: [rsell](https://github.com/t2tech-corp/Rsell-Packages/tree/main/rsellModals)

## List of Functions

1. Change_Password_Modal
2. Copy_Item_Modal
3. Item_Source_Modal_Edit
4. Item_Source_Modal_New
5. User_Goal_Modal
6. User_Profile_Modal
